price: 174. Ils s’en revinrent alors bénis de la grâce et de la faveur d’Allah. Aucun mal ne les a touchés, et ils ont cherché l’agrément d’Allah, car Allah est Plein de Faveurs pour les croyants.
arabic: فَٱنقَلَبُواْ بِنِعۡمَةٖ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَفَضۡلٖ لَّمۡ يَمۡسَسۡهُمۡ سُوٓءٞ وَٱتَّبَعُواْ رِضۡوَٰنَ ٱللَّهِۗ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو فَضۡلٍ عَظِيمٍ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fa-inqalabū biniʿ'matin mina al-lahi wafaḍlin lam yamsashum sūon wa-ittabaʿū riḍ'wāna al-lahi wal-lahu dhū faḍlin ʿaẓīmin
